room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: These were real fun and challenging rooms. Our family of 7 (5 adults and 2 kids) has a great time solving the Heist and attempting to escape the Dark Room. Not at all scary for the kids (ours were 6 and 8).Super nice employees to

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: I organized an event for my team here and it was great. Everyone had a blast, it was a great team building activity, a short walk from SLU, and we escaped The Heist with 30 seconds left on the clock!I would come back with friends or for another team event.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by ROOM 5280 in Seattle
review: Went last night with a group of friends and my family to escape "the heist" my ten year old son found it very challenging and sometimes frustrating but we all had a blast and couldn't stop talking about it afterwards! Aiden our guide was super helpful in giving us clues when we needed them! This was a fantastic thing to do on a Saturday night and we will definitely be back to try the other rooms!! Free parking behind the building!
